page.title: 08Our Farm Visit
page.content: Five children went on a farm visit.We went into the farm house.It is three hundred years old.The fire place was huge.Then we went to look at the cows and calves,one of the calves was newly born.The calves liked to suck your finger and it sucked mine in and nearly swallowed it.We saw some cows that were ready to go to market.They have very rough tongues and one of them chewed my hair because it thought it was hay.We saw a huge,lazy,fat bull called Billy.All the chickens were very dusty and made funny noises.
